sen.j: 京都劇場（きょうとげきじょう）は、京都府京都市下京区にある劇場である。
sen.e: Kyoto-Gekijo is a theater located in Shimogyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto-Gekijo is a theater located in Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto-Gekijo is a theater located in Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 京都駅にある、劇団四季が主にミュージカルを上演するために使用する劇場。
sen.e: Shiki Theatre Company use this theater to stage primarily their musicals.
Shiki Theatre Company primarily use this theater to stage their musicals.
Shiki Theatre Company primarily use this theater to stage their musicals.

sen.j: 以前は、京都シアター1200として、ジャニーズ事務所による公演が行われていたが、改装され現在に至る。
sen.e: Johnny&Associates used to put on performances at this place when it was called "Kyoto Theatre 1200(京都シアター1200)" before its renovation.
sen.cmt: 京都シアター1200→Kyoto Theatre 1200（京都シアター1200）[定訳不明]
sen.e: Johnny&Associates used to put on performances at this place when it was called "Kyoto Theatre 1200(京都シアター1200)" before its renovation.
Johnny&Associates used to put on performances at this place when it was called Kyoto Theatre 1200 (京都シアター1200) before its renovation.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを削除、カッコを半角に変更、スペースを追加

sen.j: 他の劇団四季専用劇場と異なり、同劇場では公演のみを行っている。
sen.e: This theater only provides performances, unlike other theaters dedicated to Shiki Theatre Company.
This theater has only public performances, unlike other theaters dedicated to Shiki Theatre Company.
sen.cmt: 「only provides」→「has only public」. This sentence is confusing, as the reader would probably imagine that a theater would normally only have performances. Perhaps it would be better to explain what it doesn't have also.
sen.e: This theater has only public performances, unlike other theaters dedicated to Shiki Theatre Company and play only their musical.

sen.j: 客席数は、上演作品によって異なる。
sen.e: The number of seats are varied depending on performances.
The number of seats vary according to the performance.
The number of seats vary according to the performance.

sen.j: こけら落とし公演は、オペラ座の怪人。
sen.e: This theater was opened with a performance of the Phantom of the Opera.
This theater was opened with a performance of the Phantom of the Opera.
This theater was opened with a performance of the Phantom of the Opera.

tit.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 2000年頃まで中京区河原町三条に東映封切館として存在していた同名の映画館（現在の京劇ボウル）とは無関係である。
sen.e: It has nothing to do with the movie theater with the same name (present Kyogeki bowling alley) which had been at Kawaramachi Sanjo of Nakagyo Ward as the first run movie theater of Toei until around 2000.
sen.cmt: 京劇ボウル→Kyogeki bowling alley（京劇ボウル）[定訳不明]
sen.e: It is not connected with the movie theater of the same name (the present Kyogeki bowling alley) which was on Kawaramachi Sanjo in Nakagyo Ward and was the first movie theater run by Toei until around 2000.
